person.persName: John "Jack" Dawson (Nelson County farmer and slaveholder)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, overseer and farmer. Nelson County native. Son of Ignatius Dawson and Elizabeth Ice Dawson. Married Jennie Wilson Dawson in May 1865. Member of the Roman Catholic Church. Slave overseer in Nelson County from 1850 to 1854. Farmer near New Haven, Kentucky, after 1854.

bibl.p: W. H. Perrin, J. H. Battle, and G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State, Fourth Edition (Louisville and Chicago: F. A. Battey and Company, 1887), 837-38.
